name: The Hourglass Library
description:
The library will soon be covered by sand and all will be lost, your tutor sends you on a quest to save the most important book in the library and share the knowledge with future generations.

Made for Game Jam Round 2 by BackTrace (Theme: Share knowledge), by

Umur Altürk (xumr) (umurcem20@gmail.com) - Programming
Melisa Peköz (silvaerial) (melisa-pekoz@hotmail.com) - Artwork
Akil Doruk Yılmaz - Audio

Backtrace project instance link: https://lunarlynx.sp.backtrace.io/p/backtrace-jam-2/overview
Teaser gameplay footage: https://vimeo.com/manage/videos/615630234
